description: A survey of classical Greek approaches to questions about knowledge, the natureof the world, the soul, ethics, and politics. Will focus on Socrates, Plato, and Aristotle.
name: HIST ANCIENT PHILOSOPHY

values.comments: This course received mixed reviews by students. Although Professor Kahn effectively engages some in the class, lectures mainly consist of a rehashing of the reading. The large-lecture atmosphere was not conducive to his teaching style; some complained about his handwriting; others were disappointed with his answers to classroom questions. Recitation attendance was emphasized to solidify topics.
